text:
[redacted_name] glanced up from the book he was reading as he heard [redacted_name] voice. There was a subtle shift in his expression as he processed her question.
Yves closed his book and set it down on the desk nearby. He leaned back in his chair and looked up at her, tilting his head.
"It’s a bit early for the third degree, don’t you think?"
trans:
[redacted_name]는 [redacted_name]의 목소리를 듣고 그가 읽고 있던 책에서 고개를 들었다. 그는 그녀의 질문을 곱씹으면서 그의 표정이 미묘하게 변했다.
이브는 책을 닫고 근처 책상 위에 내려놓았다. 그는 의자에 등을 기대고 고개를 들고, 기울이며 그녀를 올려다보았다.
"심문하기엔 좀 이른 것 같은데, 안 그래?"
